colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHE SEMS BSKYED MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I SMON SEMS DAM BCA' CAN 'DZIN TSUL GYI 'DON BSGRIGS 'DI NI, BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS LU MVI NA'I DGA' TSAL GNYIS PA CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING 'DI'I LO STAR BZHIN GYI SEMS BSKYED MCHOD PA'I SKABS SU, ,PHYAG BZHES KYI RGYUN LA LHAD MI 'JUG CING, ,DANG PO'I 'BYUNG KHUNGS DANG MTHUN PA'I GTAN CHAGS 'GRIG RIM ZHIG YOD NA LEGS TSUL GYI 'GA' LUNG, ,^ MKHAS GRUB BYE BA'I GTZUG RGYAN GDAN SA'I MKHAN RIN PO CHE CHE SHOS PAndI TA NAS STZAL BA GYEN LDOG MA NUS PAR, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA'I GZUGS BRNYAN LA SPYOD PA'I BAN RGAN GSER TOG MKHAN ZUR BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,)
